member.name: M:UCommerce.Web.UI.App_Start.Installer.PreStart
member.summary: Makes the assemblies in uCommerce/Apps available to ASP.NET at compile time and runtime.

member.name: F:UCommerce.Web.UI.App_Start.Installer.BlacklistedAssemblyNames
member.summary: Black list assemblies, that should not be loaded dynamically.
member.remarks: Loading some assemblies, most notably System.Web.Mvc, can cause the ASP.NET compilation to fail, because the types referenced in some pages becomes ambigous, if two versions of MVC is available.
